scripts.release-patch: npm run build && lerna publish patch --npm-tag latest
scripts.release-minor: npm run build && lerna publish minor --npm-tag latest
scripts.release-major: npm run build && lerna publish major --npm-tag latest
scripts.alpha-patch: npm run build && lerna publish prepatch --npm-tag next
scripts.alpha-minor: npm run build && lerna publish preminor --npm-tag next
scripts.alpha-major: npm run build && lerna publish premajor --npm-tag next
